guide.title: Gnome 2.16 Upgrade Guide
guide.abstract: This is a guide for upgrading from GNOME 2.14.x to GNOME 2.16.x.

body.p: libnotify builds differently based on the version of GTK+ installed on the system at the time it was emerged. If you are having problems building things like Zenity or Rhythmbox that are failing with undefined references to notification functions, rebuild libnotify after having upgraded GTK+ to 2.10.x.
